thread.title: SANDRA
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by SANDRA

author: SANDRA
title: SANDRA
text: We were very happy with the service we received . Two young ladies greeted us when we arrived at the office and were very pleasant and very helpful. Because we were new clients our car was upgraded, the car was very clean and in new condition. We will be using this Redspot Car Rentals again and will recommend them to family and friends.
